response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to providing high-quality solutions at competitive prices. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 14000}
